section.name: Overview
section.p: This IRC endpoint is an endpoint for the Internet Relay Chat system, implemented on top of the martyr IRC library. This endpoint allows a workflow to send messages, block until a new message is received, handle IRC conversations/channels, as well as perform basic IRC operations.

Unlike traditional IRC bot frameworks, dalma allows your application to perform a long-running computation that involves IRC (for example, start a new business process triggered by IRC.) As usual, dalma workflow can survive VM shutdown, so your workflow can start today and report a result back two days later.
